input.sentences: there was a memorial service being held downtown .
the roads were cleared so there would be space for the hearse to drive through .
a crowd people gather to honor the death of person .
the person was a marine and he died while protecting his country .
as the hearse drove past the crowd | the family was walking alongside it .
output.sentences: The woman was early for the funeral procession.
Police closed off the roads for the procession to begin.
Soon a crowd formed,many of them veterans.
Some in the crowd carriedAmerican flags or service flags.
The hearse finally came in sight.
